mapper.sql: id, goods_name, goods_model, type, color, num, unit, batch_no, unit_price, total_price, produce_date, expired_date, is_deleted, create_time, update_time, creater, modifier, remarks
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from t_goods
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_goods (id, goods_name, goods_model, type, color, num, unit, batch_no, unit_price, total_price, produce_date, expired_date, is_deleted, create_time, update_time, creater, modifier, remarks) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{produceDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{expiredDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
